Class UserList

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class UserList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A list of all the users in a particular GroupServer.
    See Also:
    GroupThread, Serialized Form

      • checkUser

        public boolean checkUser(java.lang.String username)
        This method will check if a user exists in the list.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to check in the list.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value indicating if the user exists. If the user exists it returns true, otherwise false.

      • getUserGroups

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getUserGroups(java.lang.String username)
        This method will return a list of groups associated with the specified user.
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the user.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of Strings that represenet the groups associated with the user.

      • getUserOwnership

        This method will return a list of the groups owned by the specified user.
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the user.
        Returns:
        Returns and ArrayList Strings of the groups owned by the user.
